name: @heather-turano-coaching/heather-turano-coaching
description: All applications and source code for https://livelifemindful.com

scripts.clean: lerna clean --yes && lerna exec -- rimraf lib/ dist/
scripts.build:packages: yarn build:ds && yarn build:components && yarn build:domain
scripts.build:components: source .env && yarn build:hooks && lerna run build --scope=@heather-turano-coaching/components  --stream
scripts.build:components:storybook: source .env && yarn build:ds && yarn build:hooks && lerna run build:storybook --scope=@heather-turano-coaching/components --stream
scripts.start:components: source .env && yarn build:ds && yarn build:hooks && cd ./packages/components && yarn start
scripts.start:components:storybook: source .env && yarn build:ds && yarn build:hooks && cd ./packages/components && yarn buildDevUtils && yarn start:storybook
scripts.start:live-life-mindful: yarn build:packages && cd packages/websites/live-life-mindful && yarn start
scripts.start:100-days: yarn build:packages && cd packages/100-days && yarn start
scripts.preview:live-life-mindful: yarn build:packages && cd packages/websites/live-life-mindful && yarn serve
scripts.preview:100-days: yarn build:packages && cd packages/100-days && yarn serve

author: Drew DeCarme (drew@imaginedelements.com)
